segments.advisor_message: Good morning! Before we proceed, could I get your full name, including any titles, please?
segments.client_message: Good morning! Yes, my name is Ms. Sarah Emily Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you, Ms. Smith. Could you please share your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Certainly! I was born on the 15th of June, 1988.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you for that information! And may I ask where you were born?
segments.client_message: I was born in Chicago, Illinois.
